title: The Mill House Murders
description: Ever since a horrific car accident, Fujinuma Kiichi has lived a reclusive existence in the remote Mill House, his scarred face hidden behind a rubber mask. Then one stormy night the tranquility of his retreat is shattered by gruesome murder, a baffling disappearance and the theft of a priceless painting,The brilliant Shimada Kiyoshi arrives on the scene, but as he investigates the seemingly impossible events of that evening, death strikes again, and again...Can Shimada get to the truth before the killer gets to him? And can you solve the mystery of the Mill House Murders before he does?
author: Yukito Ayatsuji
